properties.putsql-sql-statement:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS regiondimension (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    region TEXT,
    subregion TEXT,
    country TEXT,
    UNIQUE (region, subregion, country)
);
